home.title: Astro Full Starter
home.description: Astro project preconfigured with tailwindcss, tailwind-fluid-typography, react, astro-i18next, astro-seo and astro-robots-txt

1.title: Multilanguage support
1.description: An astro integration of i18next + some utility components to help you translate your Astro project.

2.title: Search Engine Optimization
2.description: Makes it easy to add SEO relevant tags to your pages. Automatically generates sitemap.xml and robots.txt for your Astro project during build.

3.title: React Components
3.description: Preconfigured to use React components in your Astro project. Just import and use them.

4.title: TailwindCSS
4.description: Use the power of Tailwind to greatly improve your productivity and enhance your developer workflow.

5.title: Fluid Typography
5.description: Gives you a new set of utility classes that scale modularly depending on screen size.

6.title: Lighthouse Scores
6.description: Built with performance in mind, this starter has a perfect score on Lighthouse.

404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist

content.2: The page you are looking for does not exist
